name: Debbie Pehr
bio:
Debbie is a freshman from Austin studying Neuroscience, preparing to go into medical research. 
			  In high school, she served as the President of her local Jewish youth group. During this time, 
			  she planned events for groups as large as 150 people. Debbie spends time writing letters, 
			  travelling, being a political activist, and telling people customer horror stories from her time working
			  at Whataburger. She is eager to share her passion about the potential of AI!
